The attribute used to display “heat” at: The attribute used to display “heat” at an “x y” location.
Attribute to use for sorting the data. S: Attribute to use for sorting the data. Sorting can only be used when data source is ‘Database’. For data source ‘Microflow’, the sorting should be done within the microflow.
The percentages with the colors that sho: The percentages with the colors that should be applied. At least two values needs to be specified, for 0% and 100%, else the default colors are used.
The percentage at which the color should: The percentage at which the color should be applied. This value must be between 0 and 100.
The CSS value e.g. blue, #48B0F7 or rgb(: The CSS value e.g. blue, #48B0F7 or rgb(0,0,0)
Gradual color gradient between data poin: Gradual color gradient between data points
Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixe: Percentage: portion of parent size. Pixels: absolute amount of pixels.
